page.title: 17Transport-Denny & Dunipace
page.content: We took a traffic census at the junction known as Denny Cross}from l0.30am till ll.30am. We found the volume of traffic surprising considering that the M80 motorway bypasses our area. 230 vehicles went North towards{Stirling,}166 South towards{Glasgow,}280 East to{Falkirk and{Grangemouth}and 206 came West from a ring route around part of Denny. 106 and went west from and 160 went East to the junction. The{motorway}which bypasses our area and which does not afford Denny or Dunipace direct access was also subjected to a census of an hour at the same time of day as the other census. 530 vehicles were counted on the Northerly route; 352 cars, 146 lorries, 18 buses and 14 others. On the Southerly lane were 382 vehicles, 260 cars, 106 lorries, 2 buses and 14 other vehicles.
